casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Juan Carlos RODRIGUEZ. No. 302A14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 31, 2015. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, John F. Carella, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Rodriguez, Juan Carlos. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Jennifer Martin, Assistant District Attorney, for State of N.C. Patrick B. Weede, Assistant District Attorney, for State of N.C. Michael Silver, Assistant District Attorney, for State of N.C. Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st of July 2015 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 31st of July 2015."
